ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 pound) bone-in pork shoulder (Boston butt), or more to taste
4 tablespoons brown sugar, or as needed

cookingTips: The high salt ratio creates a brine that keeps meat moist
Cook until pork reaches internal temperature of 190°F for easy shredding
Let meat rest before shredding for better texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me prepare a brine, slow cook the pork shoulder until tender, and shred it with brown sugar for caramelization.
